name: chsrpparser
short_description:
This is my repository for the C# file parsing suite. over time, I will accrue the ability to allow a user to parse multiple types of files. 

The idea came from the need to parse files for Electronic Health Records. I did this using Java for a half-dozen or so file formats, saving 15+ hours a week of manual labor. 

It always bothered me that there were multiple jars to keep track of, that would eventually be hard to keep proper track of, but didn't have the time to build an expanded collection.

This project serves a dual purpose of allowing me to brush-up and extend my C#, while potentially providing a future service to others.
